=== Playing with Live CDs ===

* grab a current live CD and loop-mount it
* unpack the initrd 
** <code> mkdir initrd; zcat /path/to/loopmount/casper/initrd.gz | sudo cpio -id </code>
* fiddle with this until it looks how you want
* <code> sudo cp -a /path/to/loopmount /path/to/loopmount.new </code>
* repack the initrd
** In the directory you created: <code> sudo sh -c 'find . | cpio --quiet --dereference -o -H newc | gzip >/path/to/loopmount.new/casper/initrd.gz' </code>
* rebuild the ISO 
** <code> mkisofs -r -V 'Ubuntu 8.10 i386' -o intrepid-desktop-i386-hacked.iso -cache-inodes -J -l -b isolinux/isolinux.bin -c isolinux/boot.cat -no-emul-boot -boot-load-size 4 -boot-info-table /path/to/loopmount.new </code>)
